lb:
[Torpedo Salvo] charges +1.
Commoner upgraded to Level 2.

During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].
Work In Progress upgraded to Level 2.

Increases [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 40%.
Commoner upgraded to Level 3.

During Night Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Work In Progress upgraded to Level 3.

After launching a [Torpedo Salvo] and during its travel, firing a [Main Battery Salvo] will combine both attacks into one, only landing when the [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target.
On contact, both attacks' damages will not affect CDs, ignores range, will use T-Adv, does 300% damage and will add all other damage increasing effects. Can only proc once per battle.
Commoner upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from medium range, reload time: 7s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Erosion Torpedoes
破艇魚雷
text: When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds. If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Tenryuu's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.

skills.name:
Operations Replenishment
戦時燃料
text: Increases Allied Fleet [Flooding] damage by 25% and reduces Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 5%
In Map Mode, picking up Fatigue reducing items will reduce Fatigue even further.

comment: Warm and motherly, but acts like she's from the past. One can't help but compare her to the granny next door...
